sentences.en: He is inept at [ in ] ball games .
sentences.cn: 他不 擅 于 打球.

sentences.en: He was criticized for his inept handling of the problem.
sentences.cn: 他因处理这个问题不力而遭到批评。

sentences.en: Hoover was inept at politics as he was superb administration.
sentences.cn: 胡佛精于管理而拙于政治.

sentences.en: I've never heard anyone so inept at making speeches.
sentences.cn: 我从未听说过有这样不会讲话的人.

sentences.en: In the first place, Hoover was as inept at politics as he was superb at administration.
sentences.cn: 首先, 胡佛精于管理而拙于政治.

sentences.en: Investigators blamed lack of funding and inept management, among other factors.
sentences.cn: 在众多的因素中, 调查人员指责的是资金的缺乏和管理的不当.

sentences.en: She was left feeling inept and inadequate.
sentences.cn: 她被弄得感到笨拙无能。

sentences.en: There are some people so inept at keeping records.
sentences.cn: 有些人不善于保留单据.

sentences.en: They ended the season a confused, inept and broken team.
sentences.cn: 他们带着一支困惑的 、 无能的和垮掉的球队结束了赛季.

sentences.en: Whan an inept remark to make on such a formal occasion.
sentences.cn: 在如此正式的场合,怎么说这样不恰当的话.

sentences.en: Why is the technology industry generally so inept at designing the interactive parts of digital products?
sentences.cn: 为什么在技术行业中通常无法设计出好的数字产品的交互部分 呢 ?

sentences.en: You are completely inept at writing.

words.tran_cn: 不适当，不合适；不称职；愚笨

trans.tran_cn: 无能的，不称职的，愚昧的，愚蠢的，不恰当的，笨拙的
